item.title: Funny experience of using trace module to trace function call
item.description: I came across this issue in httpie and started my investigation. The problem is while pretty printing the json, output is alpha sorted because keys are hashed and user wanted to preserve the order. Then I made 3 comments to the issue. First comment was half correct and explained why it isnâ€™t possible to get the desired output, quickly I figured my assumptions were wrong and second comment explained what is actually happening, finally I proposed the solution.
